item.title: 银行反弹后，欧洲央行将推迟对杠杆贷款的调查结果
item.description: 欧洲中央银行（European Central Bank）将推迟对高风险贷款进行大规模调查的结果，这默认了它认为几家银行对调查的抱怨是有道理的。【原文：The European Central Bank is set to delay the outcome of a large-scale investigation into high-risk loans, a tacit admission that it sees complaints from several banks about the probe as merited.】

item.title: 美国海上风电显示出惊人实力
item.description:
最近达成的超过 10 亿美元的协议表明，人们相信该行业终将腾飞。【原文：

More than $1 billion in recent agreements signal confidence the sector will finally take off.

】

item.title: Stifel 分析师称汉莎航空的问题只会越来越严重
item.description: Stifel Nicolaus & Co.分析师认为，德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）未来将面临长期的 "深刻 "问题，他们将目标股价下调至新低，并敦促客户卖出股票。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG is facing long-running “profound” problems ahead, according to Stifel Nicolaus & Co. analysts, who cut their price target to a new low and urged clients to sell the stock.】

item.title: ICE 称欧洲柴油合同在俄罗斯被排除在外后蓬勃发展
item.description: 据洲际交易所（Intercontental Exchange Inc.【原文：Trading in European diesel futures and options has thrived since Russian barrels were excluded from the continent’s benchmark, according to Intercontinental Exchange Inc.】

item.title: Cerberus 正在洽谈从 Hoist 购买 20 亿欧元的西班牙投资组合
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Cerberus Capital Management LP 是向 Hoist Finance AB 收购价值超过 20 亿欧元（22 亿美元）的西班牙不良贷款组合的领跑者之一。【原文：Cerberus Capital Management LP is one of the frontrunners to buy a Spanish bad loan portfolio worth more than €2 billion ($2.2 billion) from Hoist Finance AB, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国对天然气的依赖因氢气吸收缓慢而将持续更长时间
item.description: 预计英国减少对天然气依赖的速度将比以前想象的要慢，在其电网运营商模拟的情景中，氢气所起的作用较小。【原文：The UK is expected to cut reliance on gas more slowly than previously thought, with hydrogen playing a smaller role in scenarios modeled by its grid operator.】

item.title: 选择医疗部门 Concentra 在美国首次公开募股中募集 5.85 亿美元
item.description: Select Medical Holdings Corp. 旗下的职业健康服务提供商 Concentra 正寻求在首次公开募股中筹集高达 5.85 亿美元的资金。【原文：Select Medical Holdings Corp.’s occupational health services provider Concentra is seeking to raise as much as $585 million in an initial public offering.】

item.title: 尼日利亚中央银行抛售美元未能阻止奈拉走软
item.description: 尼日利亚奈拉连跌第四天，跌至 3 月以来最弱水平，尽管央行在美元季节性需求和投资者持续怀疑的情况下进行了干预。【原文：Nigeria’s naira extended its losing streak to a fourth day, slipping to the weakest level since March despite central bank intervention amid seasonal demand for dollars and continuing investor skepticism.】

item.title: 津巴布韦国营矿商寻求 1.5 亿美元提高黄金产量
item.description: 津巴布韦最大的黄金生产商正在与潜在合作伙伴谈判，以获得 1.5 亿美元的投资，将其沙姆瓦矿场的产量提高 50%。【原文：Zimbabwe’s largest gold producer is negotiating with potential partners for a $150 million investment to boost production at its Shamva mine by 50%.】

item.title: 苹果是摩根士丹利的首选，因为人工智能被认为是 iPhone 和 iPad 升级的驱动力
item.description: 苹果公司被摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）评为最受欢迎的公司，该经纪商认为，这家科技巨头人工智能平台的推出将引发创纪录的用户升级智能手机、平板电脑和电脑的热潮。【原文：Apple Inc. was named a top pick at Morgan Stanley, with the broker seeing the launch of the tech giant’s artificial intelligence platform triggering a record rush among users to upgrade their smartphones, tablets and computers.】

item.title: 波兰电网运营商为 160 亿美元资本建设计划寻求债务市场支持
item.description: 波兰的电网运营商正考虑首次求助于债务市场，为未来 10 年 640 亿兹罗提（合 160 亿美元）的投资计划提供资金支持。【原文：Poland’s power grid operator is considering turning to the debt market for the first time to help finance a 64 billion zloty ($16 billion) investment plan over the next 10 years.】

item.title: 监管机构称法国政府暂停上调电价
item.description: 法国能源监管机构表示，即将卸任的法国政府暂停了原定于下月开始的近 5%的输配电费上调。【原文：France’s outgoing government suspended power-transmission and distribution tariff increases of almost 5% that were due to start next month, the country’s energy regulator said.】

item.title: 德国农业公司 BayWa 因融资困难暴跌 35
item.description: 德国农业公司 BayWa AG 表示，由于 "融资状况紧张"，该公司已委托一家咨询公司进行重组，此后该公司股价暴跌达 35%。【原文：BayWa AG’s shares tumbled as much as 35% after the German agri business said that it commissioned a restructuring opinion due to a “strained financing situation.”】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。市场在等待鲍威尔的评论，奢侈品股在欧洲度过了糟糕的一天。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. Investors boost bets Donald Trump will win the US presidential election after an assassination attempt. markets await Powell comments and luxury shares have a bad day in Europe. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 克利夫兰-克利夫斯公司将以 38.5 亿加元收购竞争对手 Stelco 公司
item.description: 克利夫兰-克里夫斯公司（Cleveland-Cliffs Inc.）同意以约 38.5 亿加元（约合 28 亿美元）的现金和股票收购竞争对手钢铁制造商 Stelco 控股公司（Stelco Holdings Inc.【原文：Cleveland-Cliffs Inc. agreed to buy rival steelmaker Stelco Holdings Inc. for about C$3.85 billion ($2.8 billion) in cash and shares to acquire steel facilities in Ontario, Canada.】

item.title: 新加坡航空公司第一季度客流量达 960 万人次
item.description: 新加坡航空公司（Singapore Airlines Ltd.）报告称，6 月份客运和货运需求强劲，为第一季度的强劲表现画上了句号。【原文：Singapore Airlines Ltd. reported robust passenger and air cargo demand in June that closed out a strong first quarter.】

item.title: 贝莱德创下 10.6 万亿美元资产记录，报告 ETF 基金大增
item.description: 贝莱德公司第二季度为其长期投资基金吸纳了 510 亿美元的客户现金，使这家全球最大的货币基金管理公司的资产规模达到创纪录的 10.6 万亿美元。【原文：BlackRock Inc. hauled in $51 billion of client cash to its long-term investment funds in the second quarter, pushing the world’s largest money manager to a record $10.6 trillion of assets.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务债权人 Abrdn 准备承受高达 20% 的债券损失
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water Ltd.）的一位主要债券持有人表示，政府监管机构设想的公司扭亏为盈提高了其最高级别证券遭受重大损失的可能性。【原文：One of Thames Water Ltd.’s key bondholders says a turnaround of the company envisioned by the government regulator has raised the likelihood of significant losses on its top-ranked securities.】

item.title: 调查显示，印度尼西亚人对腐败的容忍度越来越高
item.description: 印度尼西亚人对腐败的容忍度越来越高，其反贪污指数下滑至 2021 年以来的最低水平就说明了这一点。【原文：Indonesians are becoming more tolerant of corruption, as shown by its anti-graft index slipping to the lowest level since 2021.】

item.title: 尼日利亚顶级贷款机构计划出售 2.46 亿美元股票以增强 GTBank 的实力
item.description: 担保信托控股公司（Guaranty Trust Holding Co.【原文：Guaranty Trust Holding Co. plans to raise $246.2 million in a share sale to inject more capital into its Nigerian unit to meet new central bank rules.】

item.title: 印度六月份贸易逆差缩小，进口支出减少
item.description: 印度 6 月份的贸易赤字有所收窄，原因是该国控制了进口支出，而且全球需求有所复苏，出口保持稳定。【原文：India’s trade deficit narrowed in June as the nation reined in its import bill and some recovery in global demand kept exports steady.】

item.title: 平安保险寻求从可转债销售中获利 35 亿美元
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社获得的交易条款，中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司正寻求通过出售 2029 年到期的可转换债券融资 35 亿美元。【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co. is seeking to raise $3.5 billion through the sale of convertible bonds due in 2029, according to terms of the deal obtained by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 特朗普竞选连任，媒体股价飙升
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的媒体公司股价在周一早盘交易中大涨，因为周末发生的暗杀袭击未遂事件提振了这位美国前总统重返白宫的希望。【原文：The shares of Donald Trump’s media company surged in early trading Monday after a failed assassination attack over the weekend boosted the former US president’s bid to return to the White House.】

item.title: 特朗普胜算上升，新兴市场货币面临威胁
item.description: 鉴于唐纳德-特朗普的保护主义经济政策的威胁，他可能重新成为下一任美国总统，这可能会给新兴市场货币带来坏消息。【原文：A potential return of Donald Trump as the next US president may bring bad news for emerging-market currencies, given the threat of his protectionist economic policies.】

item.title: 新加坡港口交通堵塞有缓解迹象
item.description: 官方数据显示，上个月抵达新加坡的集装箱船数量降至一年多以来的最低点，一直困扰新加坡港口的拥堵问题正出现缓解迹象。【原文：The congestion that’s been plaguing Singapore’s port is showing signs of easing, with container ship arrivals falling to the lowest in more than a year last month, official data show.】

item.title: 斯蒂芬-罗奇警告我们的 "恐华 "对华政策将带来灾难
item.description:
摩根士丹利亚洲区前主席警告说，可能会发生意外冲突。【原文：

The former chairman of Morgan Stanley Asia warns of an accidental conflict.

】

item.title: 欧洲央行最新调查显示欧元区企业工资增长放缓
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的一项调查显示，欧元区企业认为在未来 12 个月内，工人的薪酬将有较温和的增长。【原文：Euro-zone companies see a more moderate increase in workers’ pay over the next 12 months, according to a European Central Bank survey.】

item.title: 孟加拉国在 10 亿美元河流项目中选择印度而非中国
item.description: 孟加拉国总理谢赫-哈西娜（Sheikh Hasina）表示，她的政府更希望邻国印度执行一项价值 10 亿美元的河流开发项目，此举将缓解新德里的安全担忧。【原文：Bangladesh Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina said her government would prefer neighboring India execute a $1 billion river development project, a move that would soothe New Delhi’s security concerns.】

item.title: 英国央行丁格拉敦促官员支持降息
item.description: 英格兰银行政策制定者斯瓦蒂-丁格拉（Swati Dhingra）呼吁她的同事们开始降息，以阻止高借贷成本挤压生活水平。【原文：Bank of England policy maker Swati Dhingra called on her colleagues to begin cutting interest rates to stop high borrowing costs from squeezing living standards.】

item.title: 印度 MTNL 在资金紧张的情况下面临 5.76 亿美元的债券议案
item.description: 国营马哈纳格电话公司（Mahanagar Telephone Nigam Ltd.）资金短缺，无法偿还本周晚些时候到期的债务，该公司还有 481 亿卢比（5.76 亿美元）的本币债券需要在 2024 年剩余时间内偿还，这凸显了该公司未来可能面临的困境。【原文：State-run Mahanagar Telephone Nigam Ltd., which has fallen short of funds to honor its debt due later this week, has 48.1 billion rupees ($576 million) of local-currency bonds to service for the rest of 2024, highlighting possible struggles ahead for the firm.】
